1101010011000000 0110100110110010 0 -> sum: 0011111001110010, cout: 1
0101111100000000 0010010011001000 1 -> sum: 1000001111001001, cout: 0
0110101100001000 1110010100101111 1 -> sum: 0101000000111000, cout: 1

0100000001001001 0011111110001111 0 -> sum: 0111111111011000, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
